Tìm từ tiếng Anh tương ứng
Community service is the work you do for the benefits of the community.

Anna wants to go to the sweet shop because she wants to buy some sweet., Hoa wants to go to the supermarket because she wants to buy a new skirt., He likes to become an architect because he loves designing buildings., She would like to be a nurse because she likes looking after patients., The channel attracts many viewers because it has interesting programmes.
Nghe và chọn từ còn thiếu vào chỗ trống
I’ve worked as a volunteer mentor to teach young kids for nearly one year.
It’s windy on the coast., They’re young and strong., There isn’t any ham left., Let’s go and play outside., There’s a cat in the hall.
Nghe và chọn từ còn thiếu vào chỗ trống
Talking to elderly people at a nursing home is one of the volunteer activities teenagers in the United States do.
Sắp xếp thành bản dịch đúng
You are not forced to do anything if you don’t want to.
Bạn, không, bắt buộc, phải, làm, bất cứ, điều, gì, nếu, bạn, không, muốn.
Why do you want to donate blood?
What appliances might you have?, Did you watch the news last night?, What have critics said about it?, So what are these Christmas gifts?, Have you found one you like yet?
Nghe và chọn từ còn thiếu vào chỗ trống
We’ve asked people to donate books and clothes to the children.
Americans volunteer because they enjoy it, not because they are forced or paid to do it.

In spite of investing a lot of money in electric cars, the company flopped with low sales., As usual, during the rush hour the main streets of the city are gridlocked with vehicles., The goods at the local market are diverse: from fruit, vegetables to the ethnic costumes., The streets are very narrow, so it is more convenient to walk than to drive a car there., Some robots will help me do the housework, such as cooking meals, or watering the flowers.
Sắp xếp thành bản dịch đúng
Volunteers have given out food and blankets to homeless people.
Các, tình nguyện viên, đã, đưa, thực phẩm, và, chăn, cho, người, vô gia cư.
Sắp xếp thành bản dịch đúng
We can organise evening classes for street children.
Chúng ta, có thể, tổ chức, các, lớp học, buổi, tối, cho, trẻ em, đường phố.
Nghe và chọn từ còn thiếu vào chỗ trống
